entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:51 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.6°C

Observed at: North Battleford Airport 1:00 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

Visibility: 11.3 km

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
